description: Returns information about a recovery point.

parameters.name: recoveryPointId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the recovery point to return information for.

nested_items.name: namespaceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the namespace the recovery point is associated with.

nested_items.name: namespaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the namespace the recovery point is associated with.

nested_items.name: recoveryPointCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time the recovery point is created.

nested_items.name: recoveryPointId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the recovery point.

nested_items.name: totalSizeInMegaBytes
nested_items.description: The total size of the data in the recovery point in megabytes.

nested_items.name: workgroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the workgroup the recovery point is associated with.
